meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>sharpen</kanji> your <kanji>mastering</kanji> of a specific skill. One could say that you're <vocabulary>training</vocabulary>. Additionally, when you sharpen someone else's mastering, you <vocabulary>give training</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
